dict.string: display dialog "${1:text}" ¬ ${2:with icon ${3:caution}} ¬ buttons {"${4:button 1}"${5:, "${6:button 2}"${7:, "${8:button 3}"}}} ¬ default button ${7/(.+)?/(?1:3:2)/} set button_pressed to button returned of result if button_pressed is "$4" then ${9:-- action for 1st button goes here} ${5/.+/else if button_pressed is "/}$6${5/.+/" then -- action for 2nd button goes here /}${7/.+/else -- action for 3rd button goes here /}end if
